text: They've been married for over a decade, and share two daughters, Sunday Rose, nine, and Faith Margaret, seven. And the love appears to very much still be alive for A - list couple Nicole Kidman and Keith Urban. With their most recent display of affection in New York on Tuesday, Daily Mail Australia takes a look at the times in which they simply couldn't keep their hands to themselves. Get a room! A look back at Nicole Kidman and Keith Urban's most intense public displays of affection, after their steamy smooch in New York on Tuesday [ pictured ] Tuesday night saw Nicole, 50, and Keith, 50, put on a sickly sweet display, at the Lincoln Center's American Songbook Gala in New York.
